mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (EXPERIENCE, `LEVEL`, USER_NAME, PASS_WORD, PRIVATE_PASS_WORD, `NAME`, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{experience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privatePassWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set EXPERIENCE = #{experience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `LEVEL` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_WORD = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIVATE_PASS_WORD = #{privatePassWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, EXPERIENCE, `LEVEL`, USER_NAME, PASS_WORD, PRIVATE_PASS_WORD, `NAME`, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from user where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, EXPERIENCE, `LEVEL`, USER_NAME, PASS_WORD, PRIVATE_PASS_WORD, `NAME`, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NUMBER, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from user
